text: The Angre Koli (also spelled as Angrey Koli, Angriya Koli, Angria Koli, Angray Koli, Angare Koli and Angarey Koli) is a clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of Koli caste mostly found in the Indian state of Maharashtra and the Union Territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and nearby areas. == References == Category:Koli clans
title: Angre Koli
